Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Dreamily \Dream"i*ly\ (dr[=e]m"[i^]*l[y^]), adv. As if in a dream; softly; slowly; languidly. --Longfellow. [1913 Webster]
dreamily adv : in a dreamy manner; "`She would look beautiful in the new dress,' Tommy said dreamily" [syn: {moonily}, {dreamfully}]
